title: Masala cauliflower potatoes
time: Hands-on time 25 min, simmering time 20-30 min
description: Chetna Makan‘s masala cauliflower potatoes make a wonderful veggie side or main as part of a big curry-night feast.
ingredients: 1 tsp black or yellow mustard seeds
1cm piece fresh ginger, peeled and finely chopped
2 plum tomatoes from a tin, roughly chopped
1 large cauliflower, cut into small florets
Handful fresh coriander leaves, finely chopped, to garnish

method.Step 1: Heat the oil in a large pan over a low-medium heat. Add the mustard and cumin seeds and cook for 1-2 minutes until they begin to sizzle. Stir in the onion and cook, stirring, for 10-12 minutes or until golden.

method.Step 2: Mix in the garlic, ginger and chilli and cook for 2 minutes, then stir in the tomatoes, salt and spices. Turn the heat to high and cook for 2 minutes. Stir in the peas, cauliflower, potato and 50ml cold water. Cover with a lid, reduce the heat to low and cook for 20-30 minutes until the cauliflower and potato are tender.

method.Step 3: Take the pan off the heat, sprinkle over the coriander and serve hot.
